name: Mapt
description: For families that don't know how to plan for college and can't afford a consultant, Mapt offers a mobile suite to navigate the college admissions process, build a college list, get feedback from advisors, and follow a clear roadmap with key milestones.
one_liner: For families that don't know how to plan for college and can't afford a consultant, Mapt offers a mobile suite to navigate the college admissions process, build a college list, get feedback from advisors, and follow a clear roadmap with key milestones.
